title: Cannot Accept Match
body:
Hello guys! 

I would like any helpfull information about my problem. I saw on a few posts that some people have the same problem as mine but there was no solution. 
So ... lets say I start SOLO queue , im waiting 2 minutes to find me a match , accept/decline button pop up for **1 second** and after that imidiatly says : you have abandoned too many games or you something like you didnt accept the game ... and I **have restriction**. 
Other thing : 
I am playing with my friends. I am** ASKING** them to tell me if we found a match so I can** PRESS X button **on the queue and **THEN accept/decline button POPS up** ... Really pissing me off. 
I talked to support , I did ** EVERYTHING CORRECTLY **and still I have this problem.... 
**Its so random.** Sometimes button show up , sometimes not... I dont know what is the exact problem ... Maybe my internet? Is there any BOOST INTERNET for LoL ? 

Please help !

Best Regards!

replies.body: Your network might be having problems transitioning from pvp.net to champion select, and never getting you in with everyone else.  Constantly declining games as a result results in a queue dodge timer.  You mention talking to support, so I suggest continuing to speak to your specialist in a ticket who will continue helping you individually to troubleshoot.  Let me know if you have any questions!
